pkgmetadata.longdescription: FDR Power // This is a package for calculating power and sample size in multiple testing situations using the Benjamini- Hochberg (BH) false discovery rate (FDR) procedure. The package computes power and sample size in one of either two ways, using the average power or the lambda-power. See Izmirlian, G. (2018) arXiv:1801.03989.
